content.html: The video is so bad they fired and charged the cops involved. It’s so bad they’re preparing for rioting. It’s so bad the police chief has a message out saying she understands the outrage. Now imagine if there wasn’t a video.
content.value:
The video is so bad they fired and charged the cops involved. 
It’s so bad they’re preparing for rioting. 
It’s so bad the police chief has a message out saying she understands the outrage. 

Now imagine if there wasn’t a video.
